{{ item }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent implements OnInit { searchResults: string[] = [ "American Airlines", "British Airways", "Lufthansa" ]; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } } export interface FlightRm { airline: string; arrival: TimePlaceRm; departure: TimePlaceRm; price: string; remainingNumberOfSeats: number; } export interface TimePlaceRm { place: string; time: string; }
